subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety turned in a blazing second run in to capture a World Cup giant slalom in Beaver Creek, Colo. Ligety had a combined time of 2 minutes 40.01 seconds.
snippet: Ted Ligety turned in a blazing second run in to capture a World Cup giant slalom in Beaver Creek, Colo. Ligety had a combined time of 2 minutes 40.01 seconds.
